title: Channel Announcement - Meetup for Lila an Inquiry into Morals - by Robert M. Pirsig
description:
#moq

The meetup is virtual of course. 3pm US EST first saturday of each month:

https://www.meetup.com/washington-metaphysics-meetup-group/events/279684860/

substack: https://aqualityexistence.substack.com/

Twitter: AQualityexiste1

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/A_Quality_Existence

Bitcoin: 3CgWApeyrGsteeDybrGUau98bX5MSdHvN8

transcript_parts.text: hi there i want to just make a quick
announcement
i'm starting a meetup group for lila
in inquiry and morals by robert and
persic that's going to be a monthly
group with the option of meeting
every two weeks if we don't get through
the material adequately
on the first meeting we'll be reading
the same chapters
the the meetings will be the monthly
meetings will be the same chapters say
for example the the meetup group starts
on the 7th of august
and the chapters of one through three if
we were to meet
again two weeks later if we agreed to
meet two weeks later it will still be
one to three
so you won't miss anything if you only
attend
monthly this meetup group is an
extension of the same group that's been
meeting for seven or eight months
readings and in the art of motorcycle
maintenance it's been a great group
of diverse um contributors from all over
the world
it's been very interesting we've all i
think learned a lot i hope you'll join
us
for lila beginning the 7th of august
the other thing i want to say is i
apologize for
the the paltry amount of output i've
been putting into this channel it's just
been so busy for me personally lately
i don't have any time to to
go through the material and put anything
out there
i will be putting out the reading and
commentary videos
and i plan to get through chapter 24
this weekend and i know those are very
slow too
i plan to update my sub stack where i'm
taking the transcripts of the commentary
and putting them on sup stack
and i like to i think a good goal is to
have the chapters up that we're reading
in the meetup group
so um you can check that out i've only
got one through three up there
so far but i'm going to be continuing
that
so the whole lila project is an ongoing
thing
um if you're i feel bad for those of you
who
are trying to read the book and um i'm
putting out this material so slow
but they'll sort of you know at some
point just like
my commentary on some of the art of
motorcycle maintenance at some point
there'll be a whole playlist of the
whole
book at some point so if you start the
book later for example
if you reread the book then everything
will be there
so again my apologies thanks for
sticking with me
thanks to the new subscribers um hold
tight i'll be putting stuff
out in a couple weeks i'll begin to put
more material out in a couple weeks i
just got to get through this period
which is really really busy
so thanks again and i'll talk to you
later
you
